dmca.title: Elsevier Elsevers Ties to Google Blog with DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
October 18, 2007
 
I am Deputy General Counsel of Elsevier. Inc. (Elsevier), and write in accordance with your DMCA Complaint process to request takedown of a blog entry offering download of an Elsevier copyrighted work. 

1. The copyrighted work at issue is in text that appears on: hgp://textilec)nhilw blOemeT corn! 
2. The blog where the copyrighted work is published on is: lnw://textileonline blocuot rorn/7007/1 0!firnctionnl-dyec hnnl 
3. I can be contacted at D dodpacN,..?.?i&r (v)rn 
4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright 
owner, its agent, or the law. 
5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an 
exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 
truly yours

[private], Esq. 
Deputy General Counsel 
Elsevier, Inc. 
[private]
 
T1 +[private] +[private] www.elsevier.com 
[private]
